Name: Apple Computers Interstellar
Description: A computer company dating back to Earth's 20th century, Apple saw its height days during the Star League, with the quality of its products made it a well known brand. Most of the company's factories and technologies were destroyed or lost during the Succession Wars.
ReputationStatements: We have a job for you, Mercenary scum. As distasteful as that is to us.
Mercenary though you may be, you seem effective enough. House Davion has need of your skills, Commander.
Greetings, Commander. Interconnectedness Unlimited requires aid from someone outside of our own forces. Hopefully you can help us.
House Davion requires mercenaries of skill, Commander, and you fit the bill nicely. With luck, we will both profit from this arrangement.
You have served us well in the past, Commander. We value this relationship, and would like to preserve it.
Greetings, Commander. Interconnectedness Unlimited requires your services. Should you be successful, we will both profit.
Honored friend! Your acts in service to Interconnectedness Unlimited have not been forgotten. In light of this, we present you with this choice contract.
MissionSuccessStatements: Excellent performance, Commander. Interconnectedness Unlimited are pleased with what you have accomplished and the skill you've evidenced. Expect our payment in full!
GoodFaithFailureStatements: Well, let it never be said Interconnectedness Unlimited does not believe in charity. Obviously, your skills could not be equivalent to our own regular armies so we do not blame you for your inability to complete the contract.
BadFaithFailureStatements: Come now, mercenary did you even try to complete the contract, or did you believe we'd pay you for your own inadequacies? Such a dismal performance cannot be rewarded, only reprimanded.
